Package io.gitlab.chaver.mining.patterns.io

Class TransactionalDatabase

java.lang.Object
io.gitlab.chaver.mining.patterns.io.TransactionalDatabase
public class TransactionalDatabase extends Object
Represents a transactional database where each transaction is a set of items

    • getClassCount

      public int[] getClassCount()
      Get class count
      Returns:
      an array of size 2 : the first index represents the number of transactions of the first class and the second one represents the number of transactions that are not in the first class
